name: Otherworld: Adventure Game
description:
Otherworld: Epic Adventure is a retro Irish and Celtic themed murder mystery adventure game boasting real world photography instead of computer graphics. Explore a mysterious world and interact with objects from the bizarre to the fantastic. Ages of entertainment especially if you are self isolating with more than 200 locations to explore, 100 items to interact with and a myriad of puzzles including code breaking, sub games, mental agility, pattern recognition, word and number games. Discover Irish History, mythology and politics through the engaging plot. The perfect travel companion as it needs no internet connection and has no in-app purchases or ads.

This is our free trial version of Otherworld: Epic Adventure designed to allow you to experience the game before buying. It has a much smaller map, many of the items and puzzles have been removed or made easier and there are ads and messages that aren’t present in the full game. Check out Otherworld: Epic Adventure to get the full version.

For discussion, hints, tips, news, updates and more, join our community on Facebook.

Watch our promo video and find out more about Otherworld: Epic Adventure including answers to frequently asked questions by visiting our website.

This is an old fashioned adventure game but with a modern feel and exciting plot. Do you enjoy solving puzzles and investigating mysteries? Have you fond memories of games like Myst, Sabre Wolf or Fighting Fantasy? Are you interested in Irish history or Celtic mythology? If the answer to any of these is YES then Otherworld could certainly be for you.

To solve this game you must immerse yourself in Irish History, mythology and politics. Ultimately you must unlock the secrets of the Celtic Otherworld to solve real mysteries and political intrigue in modern Ireland.

Are you up for the challenge? Install Otherworld now!

Need some help to find your way about then check out our Getting Started article.

Stuck on a puzzle, then maybe you need the Otherworld: Definitive Guide? Packed with information about Otherworld: Epic Adventure, our Guide contains a game walk-through, puzzle solutions and the full Otherworld story. At a massive 182 pages it has absolutely everything you want to know about Otherworld: Epic Adventure.
Learn more on our website.

Otherworld is an old style adventure game with a modern twist that uses photos, sounds and background music to create a whole virtual world. Our screenshots are all locations or items within the game. Here is a bit more detail about each one:

1. In a massive clearing stands the Old Tree, its branches home to innumerable birds whose squabbling drowns out all other sounds from the forest.

2. An ancient, decrepit old wooden shed stands at the very edge of the site. The crackle and hum of an old electricity generator on its last legs can be heard from within.

3. This strange device looks like some-kind of brewing equipment. Several wires connect it to a large cabinet and from there to the railway buffer at the back of the cavern.

4. The Map Room is tucked away at the centre of the Labyrinth and hides many secrets of the shadowy Otherworld Society.

5. If you can find her the Princess knows the most intimate secrets of Otherworld: Epic Adventure.
